test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments (s String, i UInt32) ENGINE = Memory
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments SELECT if(number % 2 = 0, '{"a":1, "b":3}', '{"a":1, "b":3}') as s , rand() % 2000 as i FROM numbers(10000000)
test.query: SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE JSON_VALUE(s, '$.a') = '1' and i < 100 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE i < 100 and JSON_VALUE(s, '$.a') = '1' Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE JSON_VALUE(s, '$.a') = '1' or i < 100 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE i < 100 or JSON_VALUE(s, '$.a') = '1' Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
